an3.86:1.1: “Sadhikamidam, bhikkhave, diyaddhasikkhapadasatam anvaddhamasam uddesam agacchati, yattha attakama kulaputta sikkhanti.
an3.86:1.2: Tisso ima, bhikkhave, sikkha yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.86:1.5: ima kho, bhikkhave, tisso sikkha, yatthetam sabbam samodhanam gacchati.
an3.86:2.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim mattaso kari pannaya mattaso kari.
an3.86:2.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.86:2.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.86:2.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani, tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.86:2.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
an3.86:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim mattaso kari pannaya mattaso kari.
an3.86:3.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.86:3.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.86:3.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.86:3.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
an3.86:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim paripurakari pannaya mattaso kari.
an3.86:4.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.86:4.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.86:4.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.86:4.6: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an3.86:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silesu paripurakari hoti samadhismim paripurakari pannaya paripurakari.
an3.86:5.2: So yani tani khuddanukhuddakani sikkhapadani tani apajjatipi vutthatipi.
an3.86:5.4: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbata vutta.
an3.86:5.5: Yani ca kho tani sikkhapadani adibrahmacariyakani brahmacariyasaruppani tattha dhuvasilo ca hoti thitasilo ca, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.86:5.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.86:6.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, padesam padesakari aradheti paripuram paripurakari.
